targets.query: SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "5xx count" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "bot"::tag = 'true' AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "overall count" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "5xx count" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "http_status"::tag =~ /^5..$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "overall count" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("body_bytes_sent") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "Number of Requests" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "country"::tag

SELECT count("source_ip") AS "Number of Requests" FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "city"::tag

SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "http_status"::tag =~ /^4..|5..$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "http_status"::tag

SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag

SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$request_target$/ AND "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/) AND ($source_ip_area = 'All' OR "source_ip_area"::tag =~ /$source_ip_area$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "instance"
list.label: Jobs
list.name: jobs
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "instance"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/
list.label: Request Target
list.name: request_target
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "instance"::tag =~ /^$jobs$/
